mapper.select: SELECT A.APPLIED_DATE, A.APPLICATION_IDX, A.APPLICATION_STATUS_IDX, (SELECT APS.APPLICATION_STATUS_TYPE FROM APPLICATION_STATUS APS WHERE APS.APPLICATION_STATUS_IDX = A.APPLICATION_STATUS_IDX) AS APPLICATION_STATUS_TYPE, (SELECT UC.USER_WOOKED_YEAR_START FROM USER_CAREER UC WHERE UC.USER_RESUME_IDX = UR.USER_RESUME_IDX) AS USER_WOOKED_YEAR_START, (SELECT UC.USER_WOOKED_YEAR_END FROM USER_CAREER UC WHERE UC.USER_RESUME_IDX = UR.USER_RESUME_IDX) AS USER_WOOKED_YEAR_END, (SELECT COD.COMMON_DUTY_NAME FROM COMMON_DUTY COD WHERE UR.COMMON_DUTY_IDX = COD.COMMON_DUTY_IDX) AS COMMON_DUTY_NAME, UR.USER_NAME, UR.USER_RESUME_IDX, UR.USER_TITLE, CR.RECRUIT_TITLE, UR.USER_IDX FROM COMPANY_RECRUIT CR JOIN APPLICATIONS A ON CR.COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX = A.COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX LEFT JOIN USER_RESUME UR ON A.USER_RESUME_IDX = UR.USER_RESUME_IDX WHERE CR.COMPANY_USER_IDX = #{company_user_idx}

SELECT A.APPLIED_DATE, A.APPLICATION_STATUS_IDX, (SELECT APS.APPLICATION_STATUS_TYPE FROM APPLICATION_STATUS APS WHERE APS.APPLICATION_STATUS_IDX = A.APPLICATION_STATUS_IDX) AS APPLICATION_STATUS_TYPE, (SELECT UC.USER_WOOKED_YEAR_START FROM USER_CAREER UC WHERE UC.USER_RESUME_IDX = UR.USER_RESUME_IDX) AS USER_WOOKED_YEAR_START, (SELECT UC.USER_WOOKED_YEAR_END FROM USER_CAREER UC WHERE UC.USER_RESUME_IDX = UR.USER_RESUME_IDX) AS USER_WOOKED_YEAR_END, (SELECT COD.COMMON_DUTY_NAME FROM COMMON_DUTY COD WHERE UR.COMMON_DUTY_IDX = COD.COMMON_DUTY_IDX) AS COMMON_DUTY_NAME, UR.USER_NAME, UR.USER_RESUME_IDX, UR.USER_TITLE, CR.RECRUIT_TITLE, UR.USER_IDX FROM COMPANY_RECRUIT CR LEFT JOIN APPLICATIONS A ON CR.COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX = A.COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX LEFT JOIN USER_RESUME UR ON A.USER_RESUME_IDX = UR.USER_RESUME_IDX WHERE CR.COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX = #{company_recruit_idx}
